email: The field ${attribute} must be an valid email address
number: The field ${attribute} must be a number
boolean: The field ${attribute} must be checked as ${typeof arg1 == 'undefined' || arg1 == 'true' ? 'true' : 'false'}
date: The field ${attribute} must be a valid date
url: The field ${attribute} must be a valid url

size.number: The field ${attribute} must have size equal to ${arg1}

min.number: The field ${attribute} must be at least ${arg1}
min.string: The field ${attribute} must have at least ${arg1} characters
